headline: Agoda Unveils Must-Visit Christmas Markets Across Asia
summary: As the festive season approaches, the holiday spirit is in full swing, and Christmas emerges as one of the most anticipated travel moments of the year. For those yearning for a European Christmas market experience without leaving Asia, digital travel platform Agoda unveils a curated guide to Asia's most enchanting destinations to celebrate Christmas. Whether traveling with family, friends, or loved ones, Asia offers a diverse array of festive celebrations that capture the essence of the holiday
